content: sm k2 m1l k1 k1 sl2 wyib m sl2 wyib sm k1 sl1 wyif to m sm sl2 wyif to m sm k1 sl1 wyif to m sm sl2 wyif row 8 ws k2 sm sl1 wyib p1 to m sm sl2 wyib row 28 ws k2 sm sl1 wyib p1 to m sm sl2 wyif p1 to 1 st before end p1 p1 to 4 sts before m p4 sm sl2 wyif repeat row 1-8 two times row 29 rs using b k2 sm k2 m1l k2 sl1 wyib to 2 sts before m k2 sm sl1 wyib p1 to m sm sl2 wyif repeat row 1-4 two times row 30 ws k2 sm k1 sl1 wyif sm p2 sl1 wyif to 5 sts before m p5 sm sl2 wyif repeat row 1-3 one more time row 31 rs using a k2 sm k2 m1l k1 sl2 wyib to m sm k1 sl1 wyif to m sm sl2 wyif next row ws using color a purl across removing 2nd stitch marker row 32 ws k2 sm sl1 wyib p1 to m sm sl2 wyib p1 to 3 sts before m p3 sm sl2 wyif row 33 rs using b k2 sm k2 m1l k1 sl1 wyib k2 section seven border section to m sm sl1 wyib p1 to m sm sl2 wyif row 1 rs using b k1 sl1 wyib p1 to m sm sl2 wyif row 34 ws k2 sm k1 sl1 wyif to m sm p2 sl1 wyif to 4 sts before m p4 sm sl2 wyif row 2 ws k2 sm k1 sl1 wyif to 1 st before end p1 row 35 rs using a k2 sm k2 m1l sl2 wyib k1 to row 3 rs using a k1 k1 sl1 wyif to m sm sl2 wyif 2 sts before m sl2 wyib sm k1 sl1 wyif to m sm sl2 row 4 ws k2 sm sl1 wyib p1 to 1 st before end p1 wyif repeat row 1-4 three times row 36 ws k2 sm sl1 wyib p1 to m sm sl2 wyib p1 to 2 sts before m p2 sm sl2 wyif icord bind off section five step 1 using color b k1 k2tog tbl slip both sts back repeat section one or chart 1 3 times to left needle drop color b step 2 using color a k1 k2tog tbl slip both sts back section six to left needle drop color a you will now stop increasing to form 2nd half of the repeat these two steps until 2 sts remain pass 2nd back neck edge stitch over 1st stitch break yarn and pull through your last loop to secure note remove 1st stitch marker on first row begin chart 4 or continue with written instructions row 1 rs using b k4 sl1 wyib k2 to m sm sl1 finishing wyib p1 to m sm sl2 wyif weave in ends wet block and shape flat to row 2 ws k2 sm k1 sl1
